tillitbreaks.config.option.shownumberwhe: Show durability number when item is not damaged
tillitbreaks.config.option.showbar: Enable or disable the durability bar
tillitbreaks.config.option.showdurablili: Enable or disable the durability number
tillitbreaks.config.option.colordurabili: Color the durability number depending on damage
Color the durability number white if durability is full
tillitbreaks.config.option.showarrowcoun: Enable or disable the arrow counter
